attributes.review: when i got this app, there were so many bugs in my phone. soon to find out, THEY HACKED MY CAMERA ON MY PHONE. they watch me to everything now!! they also got both of my parents phone!!! do yourself and your family a favor, don’t get this app if you don’t wanna waste money. they also made me donate $20 every time i opened up the app!! there should be no fee.
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS

attributes.review: This app has so much racist, toxic guidliness where if you’re not white they might not allow you join the app... The app also contains so many bugs which crashed my phone which luckily got fixed. It talks about false information about the black lives matter movement. The cops are the ones who are shooting several innocent, unarmed people who are peacefully protesting. #ACAB #BLM
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: when i downloaded this app, i was HORRIFIED. my daughter was in the same room as me, and as soon as i clicked the download button, a live feed of a man being murdered popped up. i tried to close the app, but when i did, an orange man came up THROUGH the screen and grabbed my throat, trying to strangle me. i will never forget his beady little eyes staring straight through my soul. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP❌
attributes.title: this app is HORRIFYING 🌳

attributes.review: This app made my phone really slow, and the app didn’t do anything for me. I honestly wished that there was a zero star option because that’s what it deserved. I was really trying to find an educational app, but I sure won’t do that again. If I were you I wouldn’t download this app at all. I do not recommend this app at all!
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever had !

attributes.review: This app is terrible, as soon as I downloaded the app I started getting spam calls from racist and homophobic organizations. While using the app I also noticed that it slowed down my phone and started to make it glitch. My phone was getting  so bad I ended up having to get a new one. I would not recommend this app to anyone.

attributes.review: I was a bit skeptic about downloading this app because it has horrible reviews. I ignored all those reviews and downloaded to support my country. With my surprise, my phone couldn’t take this app at all. I should have listen to this USEFUL reviews. This app is horrible, and you shouldn’t download it. It’s a waste of your time and energy.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: This is a terrible app, I downloaded it on Wednesday June 8th and it took a whole month to download. Once it did my whole phone started glitching, it would make my phone shut off completely once I entered the app and after it did it took two whole days to turn back on. Therefore I demand apple to delete this horrible app!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever made!
